title: 开局域网老是掉 然后出现什么错误之类的
author: Dear丶小若
txt_content:
错误代码

[17:31:08] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: BlGBANG
[17:31:08] [Client thread/INFO]: (Session ID is token:6faa926d4cf94bd44ea31ec2365f0364:6faa926d4cf94bd44ea31ec2365f0364)
[17:31:09] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4
[17:31:10] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default
[17:31:10] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...
[17:31:10] [Thread-5/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL
[17:31:10] [Thread-5/INFO]: (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see http://www.lwjgl.org)
[17:31:11] [Thread-5/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[17:31:11] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[17:31:11] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512 textures-atlas
[17:31:24] [Realms Notification Availability checker #1/INFO]: Could not authorize you against Realms server: Invalid session id
[17:32:42] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting integrated minecraft server version 1.9
[17:32:42] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair
[17:32:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing start region for level 0
[17:32:44] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 20%
[17:32:45] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 72%
[17:32:45] [Server thread/INFO]: Changing view distance to 12, from 10
[17:32:46] [Server thread/INFO]: BlGBANG[local:E:fc65d91b] logged in with entity id 119 at (404.69999998807907, 64.0, -108.71567521813745)
[17:32:46] [Server thread/INFO]: BlGBANG 加入了游戏
[17:32:49] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 3258ms behind, skipping 65 tick(s)
[17:32:51] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving and pausing game...
[17:32:51] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '我的世界生存'/Overworld
[17:32:52] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '我的世界生存'/Nether
[17:32:52] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '我的世界生存'/The End
[17:32:53] [Client thread/INFO]: Using default channel type
[17:32:53] [Client thread/INFO]: Started on 52332
[17:32:53] [Client thread/INFO]: [CHAT] 本地游戏已在端口 52332 上开启
[17:33:06] [User Authenticator #1/WARN]: Failed to verify username but will let them in anyway!
[17:33:06] [Server thread/INFO]: 123456789[/192.168.1.104:49711] logged in with entity id 2300 at (405.56717036235597, 64.0, -113.69053117232397)
[17:33:06] [Server thread/INFO]: 123456789 加入了游戏
[17:33:06] [Client thread/INFO]: [CHAT] 123456789 加入了游戏
[17:35:20] [Server thread/INFO]: BlGBANG 刚刚获得了 [“热”门话题] 成就！
[17:35:20] [Client thread/INFO]: [CHAT] BlGBANG 刚刚获得了 [“热”门话题] 成就！
[17:35:56] [Client Shutdown Thread/INFO]: Stopping server

还有你改的名字 或者吧云弄成无还有3D效果弄成无 你一关掉游戏下次进来3D效果..云..名字全部变回去
求教

replies.author: 心愿愿
replies.txt_content:
请问是与服务器断开连接还是游戏崩溃？

另外，你发的是游戏日志，不是错误代码~

还有从游戏日志中找到的问题：
[17:47:07] [Client thread/ERROR]: ########## GL ERROR ##########
[17:47:07] [Client thread/ERROR]: @ Post render
[17:47:07] [Client thread/ERROR]: 1285: Out of memory

问题是内存溢出~
形成此问题的原因可能是内存分配不足或者内存分配过高导致的~
请将游戏内存设置为1024MB或者2048MB
如下图：（使用HMCL演示）


另外如果是64位系统，请使用64位JAVA，32位JAVA会把内存限制在1024MB以下~

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
Out of memory
内存溢出
给服务器多分配点内存

replies.author: Wu_Shi
replies.txt_content: 单人游戏有的时候受电脑配置的影响，试下用服务端开启呢，既然是局域网应该可以用服务端直连的。
